analytic.title: Aussagen syrisch-orthodoxer Christen zu ihrem Glauben während ihres Asylverfahrens

monogr.title: Trinitäts- und Christusdogma: Ihre Bedeutung für Beten und Handeln der Kirche. Festschrift für Jouko Martikainen

biblStruct.note: Examines a legal file of statements made by 1345 Syrian Orthodox Christians and a few additional Christians who belong to other denominations, all of whom applied for asylum in Germany between 1978 and 1994. Although most of the responses did not reflect a nuanced knowledge of the Christian faith, it is remarkable that in several cases the little that people knew combined with a deep conviction of the truth of their religion and their willingness to give their lives for it. However, the lack of factual knowledge of their faith points to two areas that need further development: that of increased efforts on the part of Church officials in the realm of catechesis, and that of greater freedom of religion to be granted to religious minorities by Turkey.
